div.p: Comprehensive Update Parent Letter Posted, Link Below, April 23,2020

li.a: Monday April 27th 8am-10am Meals Distribution & Follow Up to Parent Letter of April 23
li.span: Parents, a reminder that Monday April 27 is the next meals plan distribution for current reservations with the Principals. 8am-10am at the two school sites in the usual pickup spots. We also have some learning packets from teachers that have not been picked up, and also a few band instruments at Homer. Also please […]
A comprehensive parent letter with the latest updates for Heritage School District Parents & Students: https://bit.ly/2Vyfbo9

li.a: Heritage Online Learning Resources by School and for All K-12 – NEW UPDATES 4/21/2020
Statement from IHSA today on Spring sports April 21, 2020
li.span: Statement from IHSA today on Spring sports: IHSA Cancels Spring State Tournaments, Suspends Summer Contact Days. Limited Spring Sports Contests Could Occur Eventually IHSA Full Statement Here: https://bit.ly/2VpuHTa
